mapper.select: select b.m_seq, a.s_seq, a.song, a.musician, b.mood, a.address From tbl_songList as a LEFT join tbl_moodList as b ON a.s_seq = b.seq
SELECT b.m_seq, a.s_seq, a.song, a.musician, b.mood, a.address From tbl_moodList as b LEFT join tbl_songList as a ON b.seq = a.s_seq WHERE mood = #{mood}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_joinList( m_seq, s_seq, song, musician, address, mood ) VALUE( #{m_seq}, #{s_seq}, #{song}, #{musician}, #{address}, #{mood} )
